documents.title: Starter Visibility Pack
documents.content: Starter Visibility Pack includes keyword research, on-page SEO for up to 5 pages, analytics setup, and basic social profile optimisation for Facebook and Instagram. Suitable for new businesses seeking online visibility.

documents.title: Growth Marketing Pack
documents.content: Growth Marketing Pack includes full SEO, weekly blog content, social media management for 3 platforms, email campaigns, and monthly strategy calls. Designed for businesses aiming for consistent monthly growth.

documents.title: Performance Max Pack
documents.content: Performance Max Pack includes Google and Meta ads, A/B landing page testing, CRO, advanced analytics, and retargeting funnel optimisation. Ideal for businesses focusing on ROI-driven campaigns.

documents.title: WhatsApp Outreach Pack
documents.content: WhatsApp Outreach Pack includes bulk WhatsApp messaging, branded templates, auto-replies, and 48-hour follow-up automation. Includes lead tracking tools. Ideal for mass outreach.

documents.title: Email Funnel Pack
documents.content: Email Funnel Pack includes lead magnet setup, segmented email lists, a 3-step automation funnel, and SMTP integration with analytics. Optimised for nurturing and warm conversions.

documents.title: Website Starter
documents.content: Starter Website includes up to 5 pages using a professional template, basic SEO setup, and one month of support. Perfect for new businesses building an online presence.

documents.title: Business Website
documents.content: Business Website includes custom UI/UX design, unlimited pages, advanced SEO, performance optimisation, and optional headless CMS. Suitable for scaling brands.

documents.title: App Starter MVP
documents.content: Starter App MVP includes one-platform mobile app, backend and database setup, authentication, basic CRUD features, and 2 months post-launch support. Ideal for early-stage startups.

documents.title: Game Prototype
documents.content: Game Prototype includes core mechanics, basic art assets, and a playable build with one month of bug support. Suitable for pitching or market testing.

documents.title: Game Full Production
documents.content: Full Game Production includes end-to-end development, UI/UX, art, VFX, multiplayer support, QA, and publishing guidance. Suitable for commercial game launches.

documents.title: AI Chatbot & Automation
documents.content: AI Chatbot includes AI-driven customer support automation, lead capture workflows, integrated CRM actions, and analytics dashboard. Built for businesses wanting automation.

documents.title: Smart Contract Audit
documents.content: Smart Contract Audit includes comprehensive code review, automated vulnerability scanning, manual security checks, and detailed audit reporting. Essential for blockchain safety.

documents.title: Starter NFT Collection
documents.content: Starter NFT Collection includes smart contract deployment, metadata generation, and basic minting website. Suitable for creators launching NFT collections.

documents.title: Logo + Video Creative Pack
documents.content: Creative Logo & Video Pack includes one unique logo with revisions and a 30-second promotional video with source files. Ideal for branding and promotions.
